reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All of these books are great!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this book while on vacation and ordered the second one when we got home (and pre ordered the third!). Great for 6-7 year old, with a cute story. Not too easy and not too hard to read either. Hoping for a 4th book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a cute book
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is 7 and she absolutely loves this book. She has read it cover to cover many times and enjoys it every time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this book!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my cat obsessed 6 year old and she absolutely loves it. It’s great for early readers, has an adorable story and super cute illustrations. I just ordered the other two books in the series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Fun, and Heart-Warming Cats
reviews.reviewText: This book was the perfect gift for my 3-year old niece; she absolutely loved the art, the characters, and the story, and asked me to read it to her as soon as she got it. I loved how Squash and Ginny have such distinct personalities but still appreciate each other and can work together creatively to help the different friends they encounter. The story is jam-packed with light-hearted mischief, high-stakes nail-biter moments, and a vibrant alternate fantasy that readers can escape to. Everything is so drawn with so much attention to detail, and the color palette is such a fun experience as well.I've been a fan and have followed the author Susie on IG @catandcatcomics for years now, and I was so excited when she announced this book! My niece asked right away when the next book would be coming out, so we are both eagerly awaiting the next chapter of Squash & Ginny's adventures!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for young readers and cat lovers!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely adorable! Cute and silly adventures from Squash and Ginny, two loveable magical cats who go on adventures when their "person" leaves for the day. If you haven't followed @catandcatcomics on instagram, please do! Susie posts adorable side stories of these two charactes and friends and I always look forward to seeing her wonderfully sweet comics. In this story, after running out of snacks, Squash and Ginny must go on adventure to gather three ingredients needed for an unlimited snack potion. They visit three different lands, and face dangerous situations as they gather the ingredients and make new friends along the way. A great book for young readers, and for fellow cat lovers of all ages. I look forward to more comics from Susie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So we’ll received
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been anxiously waiting for this to be published since last January when the author, Susie Yi spoke at a Lunch and Learn with the Principal Zoom. She is both an incredible story teller/artist and wonderful at inspiring students, and as a principal I love that my students got to meet her! I bought 6 copies of this book as gifts to nieces, nephews and for a borrow book at my office library. The kids are all loving it. They indicated the story is fun and the art work is beautiful. A total home run.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing art and wholesome storyline!
reviews.reviewText: I've been following Susie for a while on Instagram and when she announced that she was releasing 'The Quest for Snacks' I was super stoked and preordered a copy right away! Went for the hardcover because I've always enjoyed the feel of holding a hardcover book (also tends to be sturdier) and honestly I'm in love with the little eye-candy hidden beneath the book jacket and inner front/back covers! Squash and Ginny are such adorable little feline protagonists and seeing them get their own book series is awesome. I already can't wait to get my hands on the next book to come!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for bedtime stories!
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited about this book and I'm so glad I pre-ordered it!I decided the best way to read it would be to also read it to my son for his bedtime story. It did not disappoint! He absolutely loved it and asked me to read it again!As an adult I also enjoyed it and think it's super cute. I think it would make for a great present!I'm so excited to get all the other books from this series!!
Books came as advertised. Great size for travel. Thick pages and cover. Great story to read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have loved reading the comics on Instagram and following the stories of squash and the gang that I just had to pre order this book when I saw it announced! The book itself is so colourful and fun to read, I have read through and now my husband is loving it too ❤️

reviews.reviewTitle: Although it's a book, the pictures drawn to perfection will make it seem like a video!
reviews.reviewText: It's an absolute bliss! Takes us back to our childhood. Short stories on how we were pranksters, wild and free with our thoughts and imagination. This book reminds us that we all need to take a break from our routine and get back to our beautiful imaginary world we once lived in! I have bought both books of Cat and Cat Comics and ardent fan of Susie's insta page. Her mini series are all those lessons we learnt as kids but forget to practice now! Much love and long go forever! --Thunder's Dimmy

Une histoire très mignonne avec des héros attachants, totalement adaptée aux enfants, propice à éveiller leur imagination. Malgré mes 27 ans, j'ai apprécié cette aventure :) J'attends la suite avec impatience !
